summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5692 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75285 as amended by Ordinances No. 76824 and 77148, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
